QAPair.Question: What is (are) Ulcers ?
QAPair.Answer: An ulcer is a crater-like sore on the skin or mucous membrane . Ulcers form when the top layers of skin or tissue have been removed. They can occur in the mouth, stomach, and other parts of the body.

QAPair.Question: What causes Ulcers ?
QAPair.Answer: Ulcers can be caused by inflammation, trauma, or infection. Some ulcers may be caused by a cancer.
